title: Inunaki-mura x Taka no Tsume-dan
original_name: 犬鳴村 x 鷹の爪団
sinopse: A collaboration between the live-action horror film Inunaki-mura slated to be released in theaters February 7, 2020 and the Eagle Talon franchise. The film is based on the urban legend of the real-life abandoned Inunaki Village and the old tunnel that cut through the area.
